• Adult Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma Treatment (PDQ®)–Patient Version

    Non-Hodgkin lymphoma (NHL) can be indolent (slow growing) or aggressive and has many subtypes such as follicular, lymphoplasmacytic, diffuse large B-cell, and anaplastic large cell lymphoma. Treatment and prognosis depend on the specific type of NHL. Get detailed information about NHL in this expert-reviewed summary.
